title: Matcha Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>...This might not be enough......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>This is the first time I’ve seen you look nervous, Lanzhu-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Then you’re the lucky winner, Honoka. Feel free to take a picture of me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What? Take a picture!? Um, I mean, what’s gotten you so worried?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Dia. Dia loves matcha, right? I hope she’ll like the matcha sweets we’re bringing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Lanzhu-chan! Don’t worry, everything will be fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Huh? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Come on! We have Homura’s signature traditional matcha pudding!! They’re masterpieces! As the spokeswoman, I guarantee it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Masterpieces......! If that’s the case, Dia will be delighted! Great job, Honoka!! Ah, I can’t wait to get to Uchiura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Dia-san, we’re coming!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
